article_title: The Huge, Neglected Opportunity For Proactive Medicine

article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: Proactive medicine has been neglected due to the culture and incentives of U.S. medicine. We now recognize that it is one of the most effective strategies to improve health status and reduce costs. Resources and attention are shifting to proactive medicine, creating opportunities for innovators.
